name: Please Get Out
description:
Please Get Out  Demo

This is my first Itch Game and I have been working on it for a year, turning a student project into a full demo game. 

Description: An escape game styled 3D First-Person Puzzle Platformer where you solve simple physics puzzles to escape. This game technically counts as a demo, although it is speedrunnable.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known Bugs:

  • Sometimes the level loads twice or multiple times which normally causes a crash, however is rare but can happen.  It can sometimes cause the main menu to be unresponsive.

(Use dev mode if you crashed between scenes to continue where you left off).

  • Sometimes you can't pick up the Main Interactable Cube.

(Simply walk close up to it to regain control)

  • Ramp part on Level 3 can sometimes clip through the wall if you hit it against the wall hard enough.

(Hold R to reset the level to fix it)

  • Loading Screen sometimes shows up as white

(Usually happens once)
